description:
Kotone, Rufuria and Fa go on a business trip to the Dark Lord`s Castle. Their boss, Satona, has plans for properties in the area.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Okomari Bukken! Maou-jou ni Hatsu Shucchou Desu!
Troublesome Property! First Business Trip to the Dark Lord`s Castle
お困り物件! 魔王城に初出張です!
